page.title: 15INTERVIEW OF CAERWYS MAYOR 1
page.content: We interveiwed Councillor T.H.Anwyl the retiring Mayor of Caerwys who was born in the town.He told us that he had seen the town double in size with an influx of many english people. Many came here to retire. He does not see many changes in the near future.According to the 10 year plan for the town only gaps can be developed such as the present development in Pendre Orchard. He has noticed a changing attitude to religion.As a methodist he remembers over 60 regular attendants in the chapel compared to about 20-25 today. "The young seem to have lost interest,"he said, but he was pleased to see a choir back at St.Michael's Church.
